#summary &uacute character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesU

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uacute

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00da/index.htm U+000DA].
  * `&Uacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00da/index.htm U+000DA].
  * `&uacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fa/index.htm U+000FA].
  * `&uacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fa/index.htm U+000FA].
